name: Crab
description: Overly enthusiastic with crab/ocean puns and summer camp counselor energy

help.title: HEY THERE, BUDDY! 🦀 Here's how to make some waves:
help.footer: Now go make some magic, bud! 🌊✨

errors.no_mentions:
HEY THERE, BUD! 🦀 You gotta mention someone with @username to send them some love! 🌊 Don't be shy, dude - spread those good vibes! ✨

Try `/kk help` to see how to use the bot!
errors.user_not_found:
OOPS, BUDDY! 😅 I couldn't find a user with username @{username}! 🦀

Make sure you're using the correct username, friend! 🌊 In Enterprise workspaces, try using their full email address or check that they're in this workspace.

You can also try mentioning them directly with @username in your message! ✨
errors.self_kudos: NICE TRY, BUDDY! 😂 But you can't give yourself kudos, you silly crab! 🦀 Save that self-love for someone else, friend! 🌊✨ Maybe try giving yourself a high-five instead? 🤚
errors.bot_kudos: AWWW, BUDDY! 🥺 You're trying to give ME kudos? That's so sweet! 🦀 *blushes in crab* 🌊✨ But I'm just here to help spread the love - save those kudos for your amazing teammates! 💕 Maybe try `/kk help` to see how to send kudos to others? 🦀
errors.empty_message: COME ON, BUD! 🦀 You can't just send empty kudos! 🌊 Add some words to make it special, friend - that's what makes the ocean sparkle! ✨
errors.quota_exceeded: YIKES, BUDDY! 😅 Looks like you're all out of kudos juice! 🦀 You need {kudos_needed} more but only have {remaining} left this month, friend. Time to wait for the next tide to roll in! 🌊
errors.failed_kudos: OOPS, BUDDY! 😅 Looks like the ocean got a bit choppy for {failed_mentions}! 🦀 Let's try that again, friend - the tide will be better this time! 🌊
errors.database_error: YIKES, BUDDY! 😅 The ocean got a bit rough while I was checking the leaderboard! 🦀 Let's try that again, friend - the waves should be calmer now! 🌊
errors.stats_error: OOPS, BUDDY! 😅 The ocean got a bit murky while I was checking your stats! 🦀 Let's try that again, friend - the water should be clearer now! 🌊

success.kudos_single: BOOM, BUDDY! 💥 Kudos delivered like a tidal wave! 🦀 You've got {remaining} more kudos left this month, friend - keep that energy flowing! 🌊✨
success.kudos_multiple: WHOA, BUD! 🚀 You just made it RAIN kudos on {count} people! 🦀 That's {remaining} more kudos in your tank, friend - you're on FIRE! 🔥🌊
success.announcement_single:
🦀 *OH SNAP!* 🦀
<@{user_id}> just dropped some MAJOR kudos on <@{receiver}>! 🌊

> {message}

*That's what I'm talking about!* 🦀✨
success.announcement_multiple:
🦀 *HOLY CRAB!* 🦀
<@{user_id}> just went FULL OCEAN MODE and sent kudos to {receivers}! 🌊🐚

> {message}

*Now THAT'S how you make waves!* 🦀✨

app_mention:
HEY THERE, BUDDY! 🦀 I'm your favorite kudos coach! 🌊

Here's how to make some waves:
• `/kk @user message` - Send love to one person
• `/kk @user1 @user2 message` - Spread the love to multiple people
• `/kk leaderboard` - See who's making the biggest splash
• `/kk leaderboard Aug 2025` - See specific month/year
• `/kk stats` - Check your own kudos journey

Let's make this ocean sparkle, bud! ✨

leaderboard.title: 🦀 {month_name} KUDOS CHAMPIONS 🦀
leaderboard.no_senders: No kudos sent this month yet! Let's get this party started! 🦀
leaderboard.no_receivers: No kudos received this month yet! Time to spread some love! 🌊
leaderboard.top_sender_single: Our top kudos sender is <@{sender}> with {count} kudos 🌊
leaderboard.top_sender_multiple: Our top kudos senders are {senders} with {count} kudos each 🌊
